mapper.insert: insert into chat(chat_no, chat_room, chat_send_no, chat_recv_no, chat_send_time, chat_read_time, chat_content, chat_read_chk) values(nextval('chat_seq'), #{chat_room}, #{chat_send_no}, #{chat_recv_no}, date_format(sysdate(),'%m.%d %H:%i'), date_format(sysdate(),'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i'), #{chat_content}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from chat where chat_no in (select max(chat_no) from chat group by chat_room) and (chat_send_no = #{no} or chat_recv_no=#{no}) order by chat_no desc
select * from chat where (chat_recv_no = #{other_no} and chat_send_no = #{no}) or (chat_send_no = #{other_no} and chat_recv_no = #{no}) order by chat_no
select count(*) from chat where chat_recv_no = #{no} and chat_read_chk=0 and chat_room = #{chat_room}
mapper.delete: delete from chat where (chat_recv_no = #{friend_no, jdbcType=NUMERIC} and chat_send_no = #{no, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) or (chat_send_no = #{friend_no, jdbcType=NUMERIC} and chat_recv_no = #{no, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
